embeds.title: Thank you for adding Exton Scam Tracker to your server!
embeds.description: Here are some commands you can use:

fields.name: /help
fields.value: Displays all available commands so you can explore the full potential of Exton Scam Tracker.

fields.name: /monitor-add
fields.value: Start tracking a Twitter profile for suspicious behavior. Stay ahead of scammers in real time.

fields.name: /oldnames
fields.value: Retrieve a user's previous names on Twitter. Stay informed about name changes to identify potential scammers.

footer.text: If you need more help, contact the server administrator.
